message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $8,500.
Alice, thank you for the offer. While I appreciate it, I'm looking to spend a bit less. I'm willing to pay $7,500 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $8,000.
